Name: Frequency of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' compared to 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of manuscripts that proceed to 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' after a 'SW-Reviewer Declined'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' occurrences before 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' activities for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all reviewer-related activities
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' in relation to total activities in the most common variant paths
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all cases where '' does not happen

Name: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' followed by 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' activities for cases where activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' activities by performer
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' that lead to a new 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Frequency of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' in cases that result in 'SW-EIC Major Revision'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' that are followed by 'SW-Reviewer Unavailable'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Unavailable'

Name: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' in relation to 'SW-Reviewer No Response'
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer No Response' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' in the entire review process
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all cases where '' does not happen

Name: Number of times 'SW-Reviewer Declined' is performed in the context of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activity chains
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' activities for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' done after 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week'

Name: Average number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' per case
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Reviewer Declined' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` != ''

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' with subsequent 'SW-EIC Reject'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-EIC Reject'

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' leading to manuscript resubmission stages
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'Resubmission Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' grouped by month
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' activities

Name: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' made per year
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' activities

Name: Percentage of cases with 'SW-Reviewer Declined' leading to 'SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit'
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit'", 'metric_condition': '> 0', 'aggregation': 'percentage', 'filter': "activity == 'SW-Reviewer Declined'"}"
